      y - - y coordinate

    • getTileNeighboursHorizontal

      public Tile[] getTileNeighboursHorizontal​(Tile tile, int size)
      Gets neigbour tiles from a specific size
      Parameters:
      tile - - The starting tile from which it gets the neighbours
      size - - The size of the of the return array of Tiles[]
      Returns:
      An array of Tiles

    • getTiles

      public java.util.ArrayList<Tile> getTiles()

      Returns:
      An ArrayList of tiles

    • isHorizontal

      public boolean isHorizontal()
      To check if the ship that is to be placed is horizontal or not
      Returns:
      True if the ship is horizontal

    • setHorizontal

      public void setHorizontal​(boolean isHorizontal)
      To set the variable that determines whether the ship to be placed is horizontal or vertical.
      Parameters:
      isHorizontal - - True if the ship is horizontal, false if the ship is vertical

      public void setShip​(Tile tile, Ship ship)
      Places the ship on the selected tile.
      Parameters:
      tile - the selected tile
      ship - the ship to be placed on the tile

    • setShot

      public void setShot​(Tile tile, boolean hit)
      Changes the tile colour after it has been shot
      Parameters:
      tile - - The tile that has been shot
      hit - - True if the shot hit a ship

      c - - The colour chosen to fill the tiles.
